cleaned_text: In Red Sand Project To Raise Awareness Of Human Trafficking ](/health/news/2021/7/20/tdh--communities-participating-in-red-sand-project-to-raise-awareness-of-human-trafficking--.html) NASHVILLE - The Tennessee Department of Health and community partners across the state join together for the third consecutive year to participate in the Red Sand Project during Human Trafficking Awareness Week, recognized July
